multipleIssuesTitle: {{count}} issues are preventing you from running payroll
blockersListDescription: The following issues must be resolved before you can run payroll:

geocode_error.title: Address Verification Failed
geocode_error.description: Company or employee address could not be verified.
geocode_error.helpText: Please ensure all addresses are valid and complete.

geocode_needed.title: Address Verification Missing
geocode_needed.description: Company or employee address verification is missing.
geocode_needed.helpText: Please ensure all addresses are entered correctly.

missing_signatory.title: Signatory Required
missing_signatory.description: A signatory who is authorized to sign documents on behalf of your company is required.
missing_signatory.helpText: Designate an authorized company signatory to continue.

invalid_signatory.title: Signatory Verification Failed
invalid_signatory.description: Please ensure that the identity verification of the company signatory is successful.
invalid_signatory.helpText: The signatory must complete identity verification.

suspended.title: Company Suspended
suspended.description: Company is suspended and cannot run payroll.
suspended.helpText: Contact support if you believe this is an error.

needs_onboarding.title: Onboarding Incomplete
needs_onboarding.description: Company must complete all onboarding requirements in order to run payroll.

missing_bank_info.title: Bank Account Required
missing_bank_info.description: Company must have a bank account in order to run payroll.
missing_bank_info.helpText: Add and verify a company bank account.

missing_bank_verification.title: Bank Account Verification Required
missing_bank_verification.description: Company bank account must be verified in order to run payroll.

missing_employee_setup.title: Employees Required
missing_employee_setup.description: Company must add employees in order to run payroll.
missing_employee_setup.helpText: Add at least one employee to continue.

missing_pay_schedule.title: Pay Schedule Required
missing_pay_schedule.description: Company must have a pay schedule in order to run payroll.
missing_pay_schedule.helpText: Set up a pay schedule for your employees.

pay_schedule_setup_not_complete.title: Employee Pay Schedule Missing
pay_schedule_setup_not_complete.description: Some employees don't have a pay schedule set up yet.
pay_schedule_setup_not_complete.helpText: Assign all employees to a pay schedule.

missing_forms.title: Forms Require Signature
missing_forms.description: Company forms must be signed in order to run payroll.
missing_forms.helpText: Complete and sign all required forms.

needs_approval.title: Pending Approval
needs_approval.description: Company needs to be approved to run payroll.
needs_approval.helpText: Your account is under review. Please wait for approval.

pending_payroll_review.title: Payroll Under Review
pending_payroll_review.description: Payroll is blocked. We are reviewing payroll information in your account.
pending_payroll_review.helpText: Contact support if you believe this is an error.

contractor_only_company.title: Contractor-Only Company
contractor_only_company.description: Company is set to contractor_only and cannot run payroll.
contractor_only_company.helpText: Update company type and complete additional onboarding.

eftps_ic_error.title: Electronic Federal Tax Payment System Error
eftps_ic_error.description: We could not make payments to the Electronic Federal Tax Payment System.

wc_pending_approval.title: Worker's Compensation Pending Approval
wc_pending_approval.description: Worker's compensation policy needs to be approved.
wc_pending_approval.helpText: The worker's compensation process has not been completed and may require more information. Please contact support.

pending_recovery_case.title: Recovery Case Pending
pending_recovery_case.description: Company has an open recovery case that must be resolved in order to unblock payroll.

pending_information_request.title: Information Request Pending
pending_information_request.description: Company has an open information request that must be submitted and approved in order to unblock payroll.

missing_addresses.title: Company Addresses Missing
missing_addresses.description: Company must add addresses in order to run payroll.
missing_addresses.helpText: Missing company onboarding requirement. Confirm that company addresses have been added.

missing_federal_tax_setup.title: Federal Tax Setup Missing
missing_federal_tax_setup.description: Company must complete federal tax setup in order to run payroll.
missing_federal_tax_setup.helpText: Missing company onboarding requirement. Confirm that company federal tax setup has been completed.

missing_industry_selection.title: Industry Selection Missing
missing_industry_selection.description: Company must complete industry selection in order to run payroll.
missing_industry_selection.helpText: Missing company onboarding requirement. Confirm that a company industry has been selected.

missing_state_tax_setup.title: State Tax Setup Missing
missing_state_tax_setup.description: Company must complete state tax setup in order to run payroll.
missing_state_tax_setup.helpText: Missing company onboarding requirement. Confirm that the company has completed state tax setup.
